media.title: The End of the Trail (1916) - 1.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film The End of the Trail (1916) with Gladys Brockwell and William Farnum, from the August 1917 Film Fun. The film title, not noted in the caption, is identified through a newspaper advertisement for the film which used this still.
